Constructors

InputState(InputState)

Creates a new InputState using the individual input states from another InputState.

public InputState(InputState other)

Parameters

other InputState

The InputState to take the individual input states from. Note that states are not cloned and will remain as references to the same objects.

InputState(MouseState, KeyboardState, TouchState, JoystickState, MidiState, TabletState)

Creates a new InputState using given individual input states.

public InputState(MouseState mouse = null, KeyboardState keyboard = null, TouchState touch = null, JoystickState joystick = null, MidiState midi = null, TabletState tablet = null)
